mean_en: a natural liking for something :a tendency to do or to be attracted to something
word_etyma: pre前+dilect选择+ion名词后缀→提前选好→爱好;偏爱
short_phrase: have a predilection for eating a lot
sentence: She has predilections for on-line personal ads and eating enormous amounts of food.
sentence_trans: 她偏好网上交友广告和暴饮暴食。
